synopsis.text: Earth becomes the training ground for Samatarou, the divine son of God, as he prepares to follow in his father's footsteps. Alongside his heavenly family and his lifelong guardian angel, Tenko, Samatarou navigates the complexities of human life to better understand those he is destined to protect. However, when the captivating Kumiko steps into his classroom, Samatarou's heart skips a beat, and he vows to win her affection without relying on his divine powers. As he pursues a life of love and normality, Samatarou's resolve is tested by both his family's well-intentioned meddling and the unrequited feelings of his closest confidant, Tenko. Will Samatarou's journey of self-discovery and love lead him to embrace his humanity or will the challenges he faces draw him closer to his celestial roots?
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
